content.question: In lines 9-12 (Saltem...viderer), Dido laments that

choices.label: no one around her is speaking to her anymore
people in her palace will be sad if she leaves
Aeneas will no longer see her face
she will never have Aeneas’s child

content.answer: she will never have Aeneas’s child

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
